search.title: Swiss Exchange - Gauge
search.description: Seven companies joined the Swiss Stock Exchange in a year that saw trading turnover grow by 8.5% to reach almost CHF 1'500 billion. ... 7th listing on the Swiss Stock Exchange. Today, Novavest Real Estate AG ("NREN") listed its shares on the Swiss Stock Exchange Gauge.
